text: Cherry Jones (born November 21, 1956) is an American actress. She has won two Tony Awards, three Drama Desk Awards, plus an Emmy Award. She played Pamela Duncan in the movie Erin Brockovich. She also played Mimi in The Lady in Question. Jones was born in Paris, Tennessee. ==References== Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Tennessee Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Emmy Award winning actors Category:Drama Desk Award winners Category:Tony Award winning actors
title: Cherry Jones
